item.title: Stop Teams being a noisy neighbour
item.description: You’ll hear about the noisy neighbour problem in tech, but did you know they meant Microsoft Teams? ðŸ˜‰ Teams as a collaboration tool has become increasingly important in a remote environment and many folks have talked about good meeting etiquette.
